item.title: How to Get Tickets to Cynthia Erivo’s Sold-Out ‘Jesus Christ Superstar’ Performances at Hollywood Bowl
item.description: For three nights in August, the ‘Wicked’ star will take the stage as Jesus alongside Adam Lambert as Judas. Here’s how to secure seats to the sold-out shows with THR-exclusive promo codes.

item.title: KCON L.A. Returns — How to Secure the Best Ticket Deals (and Stream the Festival Online for Free)
item.description: The world’s no. 1 K-pop festival is back in Los Angeles after kicking of its 2025 season in Chiba for KCON Japan.
